short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop products sold by e-commerce websites themselves only

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Top retailer websites such as Amazon are often embroiled by bogus third-party sellers selling fake or shoddy products. It can be even more harmful if the products are related to personal health.

One way to address is to only shop products sold by the retailer website itself. This browser extension automatically filters out products sold by third-party sellers in the search results on these websites. For example, on Amazon, this extension automatically filters the result to Amazon-sold products only.

Supported Websites:

- Amazon: Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Spain, United Kingdom, United States
- Newegg: Canada, United States, Global
- Target
- Walmart: Canada, United States
